text: SÃ´ber split in 2005, and Carlos Escobedo and Alberto Madrid formed Savia and Antonio Bernardini and Jorge Escobedo formed Skizoo. Drummer Daniel Perez, bassist Daniel Criado and singer Morti recorded their debut eponymous album, released in May 2005. Daniel Criado left the group and joined Edu Fernandez, who is also responsible for the choirs on live performances.[citation needed] They recorded a second album, Incerteza, launched on February 19, 2007.
Skizoo was a Spanish alternative metal band from Madrid formed in 2005.
